description: This header file declares functions related to firmware upgrade management, including getters and setters for string, boolean, and integer parameters, as well as RPC-specific functions. It serves as an interface for firmware upgrade operations in the system.

methods.name: FirmwareUpgrade_GetParamStringValue
methods.description: Retrieves a string parameter value related to firmware upgrade.

methods.name: FirmwareUpgrade_SetParamStringValue
methods.description: Sets a string parameter value related to firmware upgrade.

methods.name: FirmwareUpgrade_GetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean parameter value related to firmware upgrade.

methods.name: FirmwareUpgrade_SetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Sets a boolean parameter value related to firmware upgrade.

methods.name: FirmwareUpgrade_GetParamIntValue
methods.description: Retrieves an integer parameter value related to firmware upgrade.

methods.name: FirmwareUpgrade_SetParamIntValue
methods.description: Sets an integer parameter value related to firmware upgrade.

methods.name: FirmwareUpgradeRPC_GetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Retrieves a ULONG parameter value for RPC related to firmware upgrade.

methods.name: FirmwareUpgradeRPC_SetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Sets a ULONG parameter value for RPC related to firmware upgrade.
